sentences.sContent: We went to a cafe and lazed the whole afternoon away there.
sentences.sContent_eng: We went to a cafe and lazed the whole afternoon away there.
sentences.sCn: 我们去了一间咖啡馆，在那儿消磨了整个下午。

sentences.sContent: Marshal turned to watch her as she walked through the cafe, then he turned to us.
sentences.sContent_eng: Marshal turned to watch her as she walked through the cafe, then he turned to us.
sentences.sCn: 元帅转向看她，她走过的咖啡馆，然后他转过身来给我们。

sentences.sContent: At a cat “cafe,” the emphasis is not on food and beverages but relaxing in the company of cats.
sentences.sContent_eng: At a cat “cafe,” the emphasis is not on food and beverages but relaxing in the company of cats.
sentences.sCn: 在猫咪咖啡馆，重点不在于食物和饮料，而在于有猫咪陪伴的那份轻松愉快。

words.tran: 慢性咖啡中毒，[内科] 咖啡碱中毒
